31st 0f august...a saturday...went fer sat class in da m0rning..met theresa,khim n sya fer breakfast~! den erm..we're still bery early w0r...hahax....g0 BP buy choc nehx...yUm yUm....=P den erm...da attendance lyk shit dUhz.....ms po0n still wan full attendenace manz....papa came n fetch mi....saw theresa walking in da rain alone...den mama say....send her to da bac bahx! hahax..... met shawn @ parkway parade ard 1pm bahx....stupid mi..i asked him go 'HMV' find mi leh....its actually 'MPH' wor...but he's smart! he found mi in da end...hahax! o0o0o...gav him a big hug when i saw him.....his hair lyk no diff in front...bt behind ma....cut short le.....nt lyk last time long long de....his fringe.....got one strip nv cut....lo0kx co0l wor....erm...he dyed his hair to mar0n le.....den da front ish abit of gold....wah seh...still say lata nt nice! dun wanna lemme c nehx...how dare u...!he din noe tt actually parkway parade ish a shopping area nehx...~pengx~ n now he noe le....hur hur...went to da top lvl n c show case..he wanna gt a new show case fer his room...bt to0 big le...hahax...! head bac to da car.....he wanted to sit @ da bac fer awhile....coz he wan eat choc...! den erm....i said smth ' u dun use mouth n drive de' hahahax.....he ~pengx~! le....wahahhax.....ehx..bery funny...@ first i thot he wants mi to sit @ da bac den he drives....coz it seems to b lyk he's da driver..den mi da passenger dUhz..hur hur.....ehx.....shawn ish bery sweet~ or shld i say.....i've nt met such a guy lyk dis b4 nehx? hehex....erm..stay fer abt 45 mins? ehx..i oso dunno wor....oh ya! gt one woman wanted to park her car beside our car...den she lyk....aiyox....bery slow manz.....hahahax....shawn keep asking 'eh..she noe how to drive ma?' den i say....'u go help her la' he says....'i'm still a P plate okiex....bu yao hai wo~' hahax.... erm...after tt i suggested to WALK to ecp...he gt shocked....wahahax! den he drive lo....'U PIG' erm...w0w....da fo0d centre was so damn nice after renovation....its now named as 'food village'....we go walk walk nor....walk all da way to bedok jetty~ saw jerome..sec 3 de....he was der fer da 'Racial campfire ar' .....erm...den we sat @ da bedok jetty...c da sea view n0rx...ehx.....shawn keep saying ppl's cycling skill~! he wants ppl to fall leh!! eeehx...bery bad nehx!!! how can ya? hahax....keep saying 'hey tt one noe how to ride ma? hey..she gonna fall le...hey..she gonna bang onto da rubbish bin le!!!!' hahahhax....funny..~ ya la...da lady we saw...really dunno how to ride bahx! ehx..den h0r...i realised....shawn lyks babies! coz once he sees babies...he say ' hey..lo0k....tt xiao di di/mei mei so cute!' hahax...he lyks to c babies fall...coz 'hen hao kan'!!! wahahahax.....on our way bac.....saw jimmy...!!! hahax..he gav mi tt 'stunned' lo0k nehx....den shawn ask...y he lo0k so shocked? g0sh! ni cai shi ben ben! den mi wanna go bac car le....sat @ da bac seat.....see plane fly~! w0w...alot manz....one by one fly!~ hahax....hmmm....ehx.....been in da car frm 5pm plus till 7.35pm ya noe~~~ gosh...i nv slp....bt we tok in da car..time really flies.....hahahahahax....!~ had a gr8 time wif my shawn....but everything seems to b awhile nia..... hmmm......now i noe le...u n ur ex break ish tt u cant see future in dis relationship! coz she has gt a future tt may lead to some seperation! so ya decided nt to continue...i'm bery touched to hear tt...u really tink abt ur future~ hmmm.....to0 long le la....betta stop here...... theresa.......dun always tink of da negative way ...its bery heart aching de.....its ntn actually......u really wan a guy to hsre ur worries now ma?
